name: Olaf Zimniak
story: Olaf grew up in a small village in eastern Poland. He worked odd jobs in the city before the war broke out, but he struggled to make ends meet. When the chaos started, Olaf saw an opportunity to make some quick money by looting abandoned buildings. Despite the dangers, he's been successful so far and has even found some valuable items to trade. Olaf is always looking for his next big score, but he's starting to wonder if there's more to life than just survival.
